sentences.sentence: It's a little international city in Chain. When east and west culture can live concordantly , closely, live happy together.
sentences.translation: 我们可以说，这个是中国的一个小国际城市，东西文化紧密地、快乐地融合在一起。

sentences.sentence: In this paper, by using matter element theory, a method which can transform non-concordantly conjugate system of matter elements into concordantly conjugate system of matter elements is discussed.
sentences.translation: 应用物元理论，给出了把非协调物元共轭系统转化成协调物元共轭系统的一种方法。
